cause.description:
By stopping the spread of religion, we can stop wars, hate, and the slowing of medical and scientific understanding. With every Atheist's and strong Agnostic's help, we can stop these ways and bring an end to religions strangle-hold on the world.
1. Stop Religion
2. Stop the killing
3. Stop the hate
cause.mission: We wish to stop all the negative effects of these backward beliefs
cause.name: Stop the Spread of Religion
